name: Animal Simulator
description:
Animal Simulator is an open world survival game. Choose one of 10 animals and then choose a place where you will try to survive.
Each animal has its own style of play. You can choose a predator or a little rabbit. It’s up to you. Your goal is to stay alive as long as possible. You can start a family and have cubs, or lead your own group. You can complete various quests - such as hunting specific animals and searching for plants.

Choose from many locations - you can go back to the Middle Ages or look into a modern big city. Each location has a specific difficulty and style of play. Somewhere there is enough water, somewhere you have to fight for water. Each locality also has its own procedurally generated fauna and lives its own life. It's up to you how you intervene in the cycle of life. You can also run special events. The main special event is: The Big Hunt. Hunters arrive at the site and start hunting game in large numbers, thus changing the conditions and specifics in the whole area.

KEY FEATURES:


- Beautiful and realistic open world 3D landscape

- Different locations, different time periods (modern times, Middle Ages)

- Full 4 seasons with day/night cycle and realistic weather conditions

- Interactive environment

- Procedurally-generated fauna

- 10 different player controlled animals

- Different playing styles (carnivorous, herbivorous, omnivorous)

- Unique events and decisions with direct impact on gameplay

- Realistic wildlife interaction with plenty of different animals such as wolves, wild boars, deer, rabbits and others

- All activities will impact on food, water, health and endurance status

- Quests, main events

PLAYER - CONTROLLED ANIMALS:


Each animal has specific characteristics, which further increases the variability of play. Some animals can fly, some overcome high obstacles.


Wolf
The wolf is a predator. He can lead his own group and raise young. His natural enemies include bears, wild boars and hunters.

Dog
The dog behaves similarly to a wolf, only it is present in urban areas.

Racoon
The raccoon is an omnivore. It has a special feature - it can climb buildings and walls. He often steals food and feeds on garbage.

Rabbit
The rabbit is small, fast and herbivorous. Its only advantage is speed.

Horse
The horse is a herbivorous. It has great endurance in running. It's hard to lead a group of horses.

Raven
The raven is an omnivore, it feeds on everything it comes across. Its advantage is to disappear quickly if there is danger.

Crocodile
The crocodile is a very slow predator that has virtually no competition in the area. Its disadvantage is slow movement. When raising young, you must first take care of the egg from which the young hatch.

Elephant
The elephant is a very slow and herbivorous. Its advantage is strength when attacked by predators.

Dragon
The dragon is the king of the whole habitat. It can fly and set fire to homes and occupants. You can choose a dragon only in medieval locations.

Pegasus
Pegasus is the equivalent of a horse, its biggest advantage is the ability to fly. You can choose it only in medieval locations.

We are preparing other animals.
